des: "Easy and great recipe for holidays.  It goes great with ham or turkey."
ins:
Into a medium saucepan drain the juice from the pineapple.  To the juice add egg, sugar and flour.  Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until thickened.  Let cool.
In a medium bowl combine pineapple chunks and cheese.
Pour the cooled juice mixture over the pineapple and cheese; mix well.
